As BLACKARA=
CHNIA fought over against her adversary, her normal ability to use her hype=
ragility to defeat bulkier adversaries was fairly useless against an oppone=
nt who was equally skilled as she was!

As KILLER PUNCH went ou twtih blows=

ly landing ON his shield, balanced on the edge of it with her hyper-agility=
 to then try and blast his upper torso over with her energon draining webbi=
ng!

OOC - Feel free to have him counter, most of what she's doing is tryin=
